Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The fairy circle is an area surrounded by dark, gloomy trees. In the center of the area is an empty pedestal in front of a blue glowing fire pit. Strange plants seem to interact with you until you look at them and odd creatures stay out of view
You feel like you have fallen into a deep hole. All around you everything is oddly out of proportion, that is what of it you can see. You can however see small flashes of odd creatures.
The fairy circle is an area surrounded by dark, gloomy trees. In the center of the area is an empty pedestal in front of a blue glowing fire pit.

Tiny creatures scamper around, they are odd. In fact they look like mistakes. You see: horsefly (a tiny horse with fly wings), dragonfly (a tiny dragon with fly wings) , wolf spider (a small wolf with spider legs), door mouse (a door with mouse head, cat fish (a cat with a fish body), tiger shark (a shark body with stripe and tiger head), spider monkey (a spider with monkey tail), fire fly (a fly on fire), barn owl (a small barn with wings and owl head), shoe fly (a shoe with wings), butterfly (a stick of butter with wings).
Tiny creatures scamper around, they are odd. In fact they look like mistakes.
Large locus flowers emit a sparkling blue glow that provides the only light in the area.
Large locus flowers emit a sparkling blue glow.
A massive fire pit, ablaze with blue glowing fire, obviously it's different then any fire you know of.
A massive fire pit, ablaze with blue glowing fire.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{A horse fly neighs as it buzzes around your head.\|A firefly catches on fire right before you eyes. It eventually puts itself out.\| A tiny dragonfly blows fire on a near by weed. It then eats the burning weed.\| A wolf spider howls as it spins it's web\| A tiger shark stalks a nearby door mouse. The door of the mouse opens and closes in fear before it runs away. The tiger shark chases it merrily.\| A spider monkey hangs upside down from it's long tail awaiting a horsefly.\| A barnowl hoots now and then as it sits on it's perch.\| A butter fly tickles your nose and leaves a trail of grease in it's wake.\| A shoe fly kicks a barn owl in the door before it flies away.\}

X[S] \{A horse fly neighs as it buzzes around your head.\|A firefly catches on fire right before you eyes. It eventually puts itself out.\| A tiny dragonfly blows fire on a near by weed. It then eats the burning weed.\| A wolf spider howls as it spins it's web\| A tiger shark stalks a nearby door mouse. The door of the mouse opens and closes in fear before it runs away. The tiger shark chases it merrily.\| A spider monkey hangs upside down from it's long tail awaiting a horsefly.\| A barnowl hoots now and then as it sits on it's perch.\| A butter fly tickles your nose and leaves a trail of grease in it's wake.\| A shoe fly kicks a barn owl in the door before it flies away.\}
